entry.title: Sandalwood Masala Incense: Spiritually-Enhancing Natural Incense
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nandita
Type: Incense
Price: 39.00

Nandita's Sandalwood Masala Incense (12 sticks) are non-toxic incense sticks that promote a relaxed state of being while increasing your spiritual energy when burned.

  • Free from alcohol and child labour 
  • Not tested on animals
  • Naturally-fragranced
  • Used to relax the throat and heart chakras
  • Relieves stress and anxiety, while aiding meditative states and cleansing your aura
  • Believed to be an aphrodisiac and enhance a romantic atmosphere

Directions for use

Burn this incense whenever you would like your mind, body and soul to be filled with a deep sense of relaxation and spirituality.

entry.title: Incense Cones - Vijayshree Golden Nag Chandan Masala Sandalwood
entry.summary:
Vendor: IndiLove
Type: Incense
Price: 35.50

IndiLove's Incense Cones (15g) are non-toxic, hand-rolled in India and eco-friendly!

  • Natural incense cones, hand rolled in India from pure extracts and fine scented natural oils
  • Ideal for meditation, relaxation, yoga or simply as a delightful fragrance
  • Packed in recyclable packaging 
  • Approximately 10 cones per box
  • Burning time : 30 - 60 min
  • Child labour free and not tested on animals

How to use

  • Place an incense cone in the metal disk of your Hand-Carved Wooden Incense Box (or anything that's flat and heat-resistant), with the point facing up. The flat, wider part of the cone should be on the bottom.
  • Use a match or candle to light the tip of the cone until it has a flame.
  • Allow the flame to burn for approximately 5 - 10 seconds before gently blowing it out (the tip of the incense cone should continue to glow orange).
  • Your cone incense will burn out on its own once it's completely finished.

entry.title: Charcoal Pucks (pack of 5) | IndiLove
entry.summary:
Vendor: IndiLove
Type: Incense
Price: 32.00

IndiLove's Charcoal Pucks (pack of 5) is used to burn raw incense the traditional way.

  • Used to burn raw incense resin
  • This method mimics the traditional ritual burning of raw incense resin on coals, as practiced by indigenous African and Eastern people 
  • Packs of 5 charcoal pucks

How to burn raw incense resin on charcoal pucks

Place a single charcoal puck in a small receptacle (like a saucer) and light with a match or lighter. Place a small piece or two of the raw resin on the puck and as it begins to smoulder, it releases the essential oils and wonderful fragrances from the resin in clouds of aromatic smoke, releasing its purifying and relaxing properties into the air. Once you use organic, unprocessed resin like this, you will never go back to the incense sticks! It really is a special treat!

entry.title: Raw Indian Mixed Incense Resin | IndiLove
entry.summary:
Vendor: IndiLove
Type: Incense
Price: 120.00

IndiLove's Raw Indian Frankincense & Myrrh Incense Resin (60g) is a wonderful way to cleanse your space and create a wonderfully-smelling environment!

  • A combination of both frankincense and myrrh incense resin
  • Sweet smelling myrrh is grounding and relaxing and is also used to purify and cleanse spaces of negative energies, instilling peace and quietness
  • Myrrh helps to uplift the spirits and creates a sacred sense of calm
  • Frankincense has been used in sacred rituals for thousands of years
  • Frankincense has a sweet, warm and exotic citrus-like balsamic scent which relaxes and brings peace
  • Frankincense is used to cleanse places of negative energy, as it creates a sacred and peaceful atmosphere, promoting relaxation of body and mind

How to use incense resin

Incense resin does not come in sticks like traditional incense. It comes in small pieces of dried resin that are traditionally placed on live coals. As most Western people do not always have coals handy, we use charcoal 'pucks', which are placed in a small receptacle (like a saucer) and lit. A small piece or two of the resin is placed on the puck and as it begins to smoulder, it releases the essential oils and wonderful fragrances from the resin in clouds of aromatic smoke, releasing its purifying and relaxing properties into the air. Once you use organic, unprocessed resin like this, you will never go back to the incense sticks! It really is a special treat!

How to use frankincense resin

Raw frankincense resin does not come in sticks like traditional incense. It comes in small pieces of dried resin that are traditionally placed on live coals. As most Western people do not always have coals handy, we use charcoal 'pucks', which are placed in a small receptacle (like a saucer) and lit. A small piece or two of the frankincesne resin is placed on the puck and as it begins to smoulder, it releases the essential oils and wonderful fragrances from the resin in clouds of aromatic smoke, releasing its purifying and relaxing properties into the air. Once you use organic, unprocessed resin like this, you will never go back to the incense sticks! It really is a special treat!

How to use myrrh resin

Myrrh resin does not come in sticks like traditional incense. It comes in small pieces of dried resin that are traditionally placed on live coals. As most Western people do not always have coals handy, we use charcoal 'pucks', which are placed in a small receptacle (like a saucer) and lit. A small piece or two of the myrrh resin is placed on the puck and as it begins to smoulder, it releases the essential oils and wonderful fragrances from the resin in clouds of aromatic smoke, releasing its purifying and relaxing properties into the air. Once you use organic, unprocessed resin like this, you will never go back to the incense sticks! It really is a special treat!

entry.title: Frankincense - Calming & Cleansing Ethiopian Incense Resin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Tribe
Type: Home Products
Price: 144.00

Earth Tribe's Frankincense (50 g) is an exotic Ethiopian resin that seeps from the bark of African Boswellia Rivae trees and sacred to many. Frankincense is an African medicine, incense and perfume that's used to purify places, bodies and minds, in additional to useful antibacterial properties and a warm, sweet aroma. 

  • A useful incense resin for home, car or office cleansing
  • Healing and calming and said to purify the air due to its antibacterial properties
  • Traditionally used to cleanse places of negative energy, as it creates a sacred and peaceful atmosphere, promoting relaxation of body and mind
  • Ayurvedic practitioners use Frankincense to balance women's hormones, to make tinctures for wounds and to assist in digestion when chewed like gum 

Ingredients

Natural resin

Directions for use

Burn the Frankincense incense by placing a small piece on a lit charcoal puck. This releases the essential oils and fragrances from the resin in an aromatic smoke.
entry.s:tag: Earth Tribe wholesale distributor South Africa

IndiLove's Handmade Carved Wooden & Brass Flat Incense Holder is made in India for your favourite incense sticks.

  • Handcrafted from Indian rosewood and inlaid with brass
  • Holds your incense sticks and safely catches any ash and debris as they burn down
  • Makes a perfect and unique gift 

How to use

Light up a stick of your favourite natural fragrance, place it in your handcrafted rosewood ash catcher and let the aroma envelop you

entry.title: Sweet Myrrh - Raw African Incense Resin For Grounding & Relaxation
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Tribe
Type: Home Products
Price: 144.00

Earth Tribe's Myrrh Resin (50 g) is an exotic Ethiopian resin that seeps from the Commiphora Guidotti plant that emits relaxing, antiseptic, anti-inflammatory and sweet aromas, used for grounding and relaxation.

  • A relaxing, antiseptic, anti-inflammatory, sweet-smelling, fruity sweet incense resin
  • Cleanses places of negative energies due to antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties while lifting energies 
  • High in antioxidants and 100% natural
  • Helpful for skin infections such as athlete’s foot, ringworm, weeping eczema, bedsores, boils, carbuncles, and acne
  • Excellent for oral health when added to natural mouth washes
  • Burned as an air purifying agent, clears and lifts the mood

Ingredients

Natural resin

Directions for use

Burn the incense by placing small piece on a lit charcoal puck. this releases the essential oils and fragrances from the resin in an aromatic smoke.
